reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 17

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 17

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfers to Songhees Nation Investment Corporation Inc., Inc. No. BC 0961948, of the properties described below are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Lot A of Lots 1775 and 1776, Victoria City, Plan EPP28098, PID 029-107-962;
Lot B of Lots 1777 and 1778, Victoria City, Plan EPP28098, PID 029-107-971;
Lot C of Lots 1777 and 1778, Victoria City, Plan EPP28098, PID 029-107-989;
Lot 1, Suburban Lot 39, Esquimalt District, Plan EPP28097, PID 029-072-883.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to October 1, 2013, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
